text: We have a React feature that we were launching on a page, and we found that when we moved the page from being *password-protected* to *public*, we were getting a different behavior. In this case, it's a form input. Has anybody experienced anything like this before? We've engaged our HubSpot technical consultant, and they still can't seem to figure it out

You can add React-based modules, but I'm guessing your team members are not yet doing any local development. If they gear up on <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> first, then they should be able to add a React project to your theme, and build a module that can be integrated in.
